description: Make the most of leftover burger patties in this easy salad recipe. It's got it all - fresh veggies, crispy bacon and sliced burger patties.
keywords: Salad,Seafood free,Bonus,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Budget,Jul 2021,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Salad with The Lot Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 small red onion, thinly sliced into rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tbs oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook bacon, stirring, for 3 minutes or until golden and crisp. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate.
Heat another 1 tbs oil in same pan over medium-high heat. Cook patties, turning occasionally, for 7 minutes or until browned and cooked through. Transfer to a board. Thinly slice.
Arrange lettuce on a platter. Top with patties, bacon, tomato, onion, cheese and basil. Drizzle with vinegar and remaining oil. Season and serve.
